sentences.en: All the day to computer radiate very intense, is the skin black?
sentences.cn: 整天对着电脑辐射很强烈, 是不是皮肤会黑?

sentences.en: Avenues radiate from the Arc de Triomphe in Paris.
sentences.cn: 在巴黎,街道以凯旋门为中心向四方伸展.

sentences.en: Callahan posits that chemical elements radiate electromagnetic signals.
sentences.cn: 卡拉汉假定化学元素放射电磁信号。
危险的辐射物从钚放散出来.

sentences.en: Five roads radiate from this roundabout.
sentences.cn: 有五条道路以这个环状交叉路为中心向各方伸展开.

sentences.en: Four avenues radiate from the square.
sentences.cn: 四条林荫大道从那广场向四方延伸.
他身上散发着沉稳自信的气质。

sentences.en: He seemed to radiate an atmosphere which suffused her being.
sentences.cn: 他身上似乎散发出一种氛围,渗透到她全身心.

sentences.en: I desire to radiate health, cheerfulness, calm courage and good will.
sentences.cn: 我渴望健康 、 快乐 、 平静的勇气和良好的志愿.

sentences.en: Many kinds of woodland can be seen on the various walks which radiate from the Heritage Centre.
sentences.cn: 从遗产中心向外伸展的各条走道上可以看到多种林地。

sentences.en: Most light sources do not radiate equally in all directions.
sentences.cn: 大多数光源并非在所有各方面都等量地辐射.

sentences.en: Most of Britain's motorways radiate from London.
sentences.cn: 英国多数汽车道都是从伦敦向四方伸展的.

sentences.en: Roads radiate from the city in every direction.
sentences.cn: 道路从城市向四面八方延伸.

sentences.en: Southeast with coastal high - speed railroad docking, will radiate the area.
sentences.cn: 与沿海 高速 铁路对接, 将辐射东南地区.

sentences.en: Stoves are meant to radiate heat.
The dipole does not radiate energy in the direction of its axis.
sentences.cn: 偶极子在它的轴的方向上不发射能量.

sentences.en: The log fire radiated a warm cosy glow.
sentences.cn: 燃烧的原木发出温暖舒适的红光。

words.tran_cn: 半径的；放射状的；光线的；光线状的
辐射的；容光焕发的；光芒四射的
辐射；光辉；发光；容光焕发
[物]辐射；流露；发光；从中心向各方伸展

trans.tran_cn: 发出， 辐射； 流露， 显示
trans.tran_en: if someone radiates a feeling, or if it radiates from them, it is very easy to see that this is how they feel

trans.tran_cn: 辐射，发射，使向周围扩展
